text: Al-Thani in 2012 Sheikh Ali Bin Khalid Al-Thani (born September 1, 1982) is a Qatari equestrian. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the individual jumping event, in which he placed sixth, and in the team jumping event, in which Qatar's team placed ninth. He was the flag bearer for Qatar at the Parade of Nations. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Qatari male equestrians Category:Equestrians at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic equestrians of Qatar Category:Equestrians at the 2006 Asian Games Category:Equestrians at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Equestrians at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Equestrians at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Qatar Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Qatar Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Qatar Category:Asian Games medalists in equestrian Category:Medalists at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games
title: Ali Al-Thani
